description: This file initializes an Agent object with a specific AIMLApi model, then uses the agent to generate responses about an image, including providing an image URL and requesting more images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with AIML API and media, capable of generating responses based on input prompts.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image with a URL, used as input for the agent.

classes.name: AIMLApi
classes.description: Represents an AIML API model used by the agent for processing.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and outputs a response based on the provided prompt, images, and streaming options.
